thread.title: Coronation Street huge spoiler preview revealed – Confession, secret and rage | Metro News
thread.title_full: Coronation Street huge spoiler preview revealed – Confession, secret and rage | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Coronation Street huge spoiler preview revealed – Confession, secret and rage | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 2:49 pm (Picture: ITV) 
Tempers are flaring as the residents of Coronation Street strive to protect the ones that they love. As Daniel Osbourne loses his rag when Chesney Brown takes revenge on Sinead Tinker, Sally Metcalfe wages a war on the local builders in order to defend her daughter Rosie Webster. 
Elsewhere, concerned Sarah Platt takes steps to find out what is going on with Bethany and her mysterious boyfriend but will she realise quite how much danger her daughter is in? 
We have rounded up the latest Weatherfield spoilers for you and included an in depth episode guide so you know what happens when. 10 Corrie spoilers When Anna reveals Rosie’s drugs mule secret to Sally, Rosie breaks down and admits the truth about her life in the US. Shona and Gail cross swords when Gail wrongly accuses Shona of stealing her purse. Mel tells Bethany to get the contraceptive implant as Nathan doesn’t want her to get pregnant. Sally leads a protest against the builders when one of them makes an overly flirty comment to Rosie. Daniel tackles Chesney and loses his cool when he finds him selling Sinead’s belongings in the kebab shop. Sarah finds Nathan’s number and invites him to tea, much to Bethany’s horror. Adam makes contact with a drug dealer but is he getting out of his depth? Sinead learns she is pregnant but how will Daniel react when he finds the positive test. Rita is disappointed when her friends forget her birthday. There is a thawing between Gail and Shona when Gail helps her out during a busy spell at the cafe. Monday 27th February Part One (Picture: ITV) 
Sally has a go at Kevin for making Rosie and Sophie clean windows but Sally is stunned when Anna bites back and points out that Rosie was a drugs mule. Gail squares up to Shona in the cafe after discovering that her purse is missing. 
Sinead decides to get her soap making business going again to help raise some money for her and Daniel and resolves to go to No 5 to collect her kit. Rita is put out when her friends forget her birthday. Monday 27th February Part Two (Picture: ITV) 
Roy is shocked to find Gail and Shona at each others’ throats in the cafe and Gail threatens to boycott the cafe. But when David later finds the purse at home, Gail is forced into making a half hearted apology. 
Rosie bursts into tears and admits to Sally that she has been lying about her life abroad. Sally vows to become a better mum and later threatens the builder Zack with a sexual harassment lawsuit when he makes flirty comments to Rosie. 
Chesney gets the wrong idea when Sinead asks to come round and is left crushed when he realises there is no chance of a reunion. Wednesday 1st March 
Sally stages a public protest after Zack makes more lewd comments.. Clutching a megaphone, she brings attention to the sexist attitudes when the foreman of the building site refuses to take her complaints seriously. (Picture: ITV) 
Daniel is enraged when he catches a vengeful Chesney selling Sinead’s belongings and loses his cool with him. Later, he presents a stunned Sinead with a necklace that belonged to his mum. 
Gail comes to Shona’s aid when she finds her rushed off her feet in the cafe and Mel tells Bethany to get the implant as Nathan won’t want her to get pregnant. Friday 3rd March Part One 
Chesney tries to make amends with Sinead after a telling off from Fiz and presents her with a hotel voucher. As Sinead gets confused by the booking dates, she soon makes the shocking realisation that she’s pregnant. 
The building foreman urges Gary to have a word as the residents continue their protest. Sarah quizzes Bethany about her evening with Nathan and then sneakily finds his number on her phone. (Picture: ITV) 
Tracy persuades Adam to help out in the flower shop and he forms a plan. Meanwhile, Ken is unimpressed with Adam’s cheating on his law exams and Daniel’s fighting in the street over Sinead and confides his concerns in Brian. Friday 3rd March Part Two (Picture: ITV) 
Bethany is horrified to discover that Sarah has sent a message to Nathan inviting him round for tea. After Gary tries to talk the protesters round, Rita is fuming and chains herself to the railings with a bicycle lock. 
Beth advises Sinead to keep her pregnancy a secret from Daniel but when he later finds the test, how will he react? Adam pulls up outside of drug dealer Ronan Truman’s house. Bethany feels grown up after having the implant put in. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
